resources.string:
In the 1st tab, you can view all the ingredients you selected on the 2nd tab. Once you click on any part of the screen, you can view the recipes of the food you can make with the selected ingredients. 

In the 2nd tab, you can select which ingredients you have, and the change will be reflected on the 1st tab. 

In the 3rd tab, you can view all the recipes available. 

Whenever you select a food item and make it your favorite by clicking on a star, it will be saved and the change will be reflected on the 4th tab.
